Jotunn: Right. All hands to their station. We launch in 3, 2, 1, Lift off!
=

The transports shuddered as they left the dock but, as they cleared,
gaine=
d more and more speed until they were over the land and bound for
Atlantis.=


Jotunn: This will take some time. I want a team of fliers standing by.
 Y=
ou'll be the spearhead. We can't use the autoguns before we have
clear enem=
y IDs. Your job will be to throw the minions in disarray and
to paint them =
for artillery to take them down. We want to avoid
friendly fire at all cost=
. Once the most of them are gone, ground team
takes over. I want you to pac=
k as much a punch as possible We shoot
for the kill against them, because i=
f they retreat, they'll come back
even worse after that. Understood?

The c=
rew signified its approval. Jotunn then looked over to Grimlock
and Elder.
=
